snippet.title: Shy Guy Surfing - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Are you a bad enough dude to surf across the world?

Shy Guy Surfing is available NOW wherever Mario fangames can be found!
▶ ITCH.IO | https://lucaspucas.itch.io/shy-guy-surfing
▶ GameJolt | https://gamejolt.com/games/shyguysurfing/676667
▶ MFGG | https://mfgg.net/index.php?act=resdb&param=02&c=2&id=40944

▶ DISCLAIMER: Shy Guy Surfing is an independent non-commercial fangame project. It is neither licensed by nor endorsed by Nintendo, and all characters are owned by Nintendo, SEGA, and Square-Enix.

▶ Subscribe!
http://youtube.com/lucaspucas
▶ Celebrate the launch with us on our Discord server!
https://discord.gg/nqw382xyPy
